timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't it be better to map the keys to elements and then collect into a list at the end instead of populating the list as part of a forEach?
timeline.author: sguilhen

replies.bodyText: @martin-kanis Overall this really looks good to me, thanks for the great work. Just one minor suggestion as you can see above.
replies.author: sguilhen

replies.bodyText: Right, changed to map + collect. Thank you Stefan for the review.
replies.author: martin-kanis
